<Text: The North Western and Charing Cross Railway (NW&CCR) was a railway company established in 1864 to construct an underground railway in London.>

<Text: North Western and Charing Cross Railway:  The NW&CCR was one of a large number of underground railway schemes proposed for London following the opening in 1863 of the Metropolitan Railway, the world's first underground railway, but was one of only a few to be authorised by Parliament.>
